title: Strengthening Mathematical Practical Competencies Through Participation in Expert Learning Events

context.prior_knowledge: Over five years of practical experience in mathematics, project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: A course where current mathematical practitioners expand their professional networks through expert event participation and learn to apply acquired knowledge to projects.

learning_goals: Learners can establish meaningful connections with at least three industry professionals by utilizing networking strategies at expert events.
Learners can analyze knowledge acquired at events to derive two or more actionable solutions applicable to their projects.
Learners can develop knowledge utilization strategies based on event experiences and refine them through peer assessment and self-reflection.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
